chess_camp_type-20000001: An industrial manufacturing company founded during World War III. With technological support from the former 90wish member Persica, they started producing Tactical Dolls in wartime.
chess_camp_type-20000002: Svarog is an old and well-known corporation in heavy industries that operates on a gigantic scale. They have businesses in sectors such as ordnance manufacturing, energy, and infrastructure construction. They have also made significant contributions in developing smart cities and new energy sources.
chess_camp_type-20000003: A brand new research team sponsored by IOP that specializes in studying 90wish's legacy - the Zener Protocol.
chess_camp_type-20000004: An old big name in the industrial manufacturing sector that started developing brand new Tactical Dolls using artificial intelligence after the end of World War III.
